Sentencas: Solid-oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and operating at 500 degrees C are shown to be feasible.
Titulo: Development of solid-oxide fuel cells that operate at 500°C

Sentencas: The operating regime of doped ceria electrolytes is discussed.
Titulo: Development of solid-oxide fuel cells that operate at 500°C

Sentencas: It is shown that the ionic conductivity of ceria-based fuel cells is sufficiently high for operation with hydrogen fuel at low temperatures.
Titulo: Development of solid-oxide fuel cells that operate at 500°C

Sentencas: The major challenges of fabricating a thin electrolyte by a conventional method and the development of high-performance cathodes capable of operating at 500-600 degrees C are addressed.
Titulo: Development of solid-oxide fuel cells that operate at 500°C

Sentencas: Cells based on thin-film ceria electrolytes also exhibited good open-circuit voltages between 0.97 and 1 V. Cathode materials with high performance have been developed from pyrochlores, perovskites, and cermets of silver and doped bismuth oxide.
Titulo: Development of solid-oxide fuel cells that operate at 500°C

Sentencas: The advantages and disadvantages of different cathode materials are discussed.
Titulo: Development of solid-oxide fuel cells that operate at 500°C

Sentencas: The maximum power density obtained at 500 degrees C was 140 mW/cm(2).
Titulo: Development of solid-oxide fuel cells that operate at 500°C
